findings.quote: Mr. Aguirre, we are not here to reconsider the findings of the trial and appellate courts, nor are we here to retry your case. The purpose of today's hearing is to find who you are today and whether you pose an unreasonable risk of danger to society, if released.

findings.significance: Sets the context for the hearing, indicating that previous legal findings (guilt) are assumed, and the focus is on the incarcerated person's current rehabilitation and risk, not re-litigating innocence.

findings.quote: Right -- right.

findings.quote: No, I don't know. Okay. No, I want -- I want to hear from you, okay. Don't just accede to the record. That doesn't help me. I got the record, okay.
